Name: J-Type Diplomatic Barge
Notes: Built to Impress: All J-type diplomatic barges count as having a Luxury Passenger Compartments attachment installed at no additional cost.  This attachment cannot be removed and does not count against the vehicle&#39s total hard points.

Name: Suwantek TL-1200 Transport
Notes: Up to 100 passengers in the cargo holds.

Name: Agressor Assault Fighter
Notes: Safety Limiters: As a maneuver shut off safety limiters to change Handling to +3 but any piloting maneuver causes all characters aboard to suffer 3 strain droids and possibly (GM&#39s discretion) characters with 4+ cybernetic enhancements suffer only 1 strain

Name: Darvro-class Light Freighter
Notes: Gimmellian Stealth Device Electronic Countermeasures Suite

Name: Incom A-36 Pathfinder-Class Force Reconnaissance Vessel
MC-18 Light Freighter
Notes: Custom Construction: When acquiring an MC-18 light freighter choose one attachment that requires a single hard point and add it to the ship at no additional cost.  This attachment cannot be removed and does not count against the ship&#39s total hard points.

Consular-Class Cruiser's Salon Pod
